name: Asset Packs
description: Resources that include assets in bundles of similar-themed assets

entries.name: Kenney.nl
entries.description: Kenney is an awesome creator making high quality CC0 assets as well as working on other projects as well.
entries.site_excerpt: We've created thousands of sprites, 3D models and sound effects which you can use in your projects. The generous public domain license allows any kind of use, even commercial!
